dmca.title: [ABUSE] EchoStar: India v England 2006 infringements - EchoStar_NRID13196
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
Policy Enforcement
Sent: Wednesday, April 12, 2006 10:45 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] EchoStar: India v England 2006 infringements -
EchoStar_NRID13196]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/


- -------- Original Message --------
From:         - Wed Apr 12 10:25:34 2006
X-Mozilla-Status:         0001
X-Mozilla-Status2:         00000000
Received:         from localhost ([127.0.0.1] helo=[216.185.111.52]) by
mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com)
with esmtp (Exim) id 1FTgTz-0002Jx-VN; Wed, 12 Apr 2006 09:38:12 -0500
Received:         from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180]
helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
JonnyH@nr-online.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id
1FTgTy-0002Jk-P3 for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 12 Apr 2006 09:38:10 -0500
Received:         from email.nr-online.com ([217.204.130.186]) by
mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from JonnyH@nr-online.com) with esmtps
(TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1FTgTv-00017m-GR for
abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 12 Apr 2006 09:38:10 -0500
Received:         (qmail 1279 invoked by uid 89); 12 Apr 2006 15:37:00 +0100
Received:         from unknown (HELO D1Y45X1J) (192.168.50.108) by 0 (qmail
1.03 + ejcp v14) with SMTP; 12 Apr 2006 15:37:00 +0100
From:         Jonny Hartley <JonnyH@nr-online.com>
To:         <adminfss@gmail.com>
Date:         Wed, 12 Apr 2006 15:40:03 +0100
MIME-Version:         1.0
Content-Type:         multipart/alternative;
boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0067_01C65E47.5DDAFF00"
X-Priority:         1 (Highest)
X-MSMail-Priority:         High
X-Mailer:         Microsoft Office Outlook, Build 11.0.6353
X-MimeOLE:         Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2670
Thread-Index:
AcZHaCPVyNqzz+f1QtChvOq132sN2QWpj6dAAAFxWPAAAKQ1sAAFMyzwAAGxUMAAAv4OAA==
Importance:         High
Received-SPF:         pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of nr-online.com
designates 217.204.130.186 as permitted sender) client-ip=217.204.130.186;
envelope-from=JonnyH@nr-online.com;
helo=email.nr-online.com;
X-Spam-Level:         ---------------------------------------------------
X-Spam-Score:         -100.1
Cc:         abuse@internap.com, abuse@theplanet.com
Subject:         [ABUSE] EchoStar: India v England 2006 infringements -
EchoStar_NRID13196
X-BeenThere:         abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version:         2.1.7
Precedence:         list
List-Id:         <abuse.lists.theplanet.com>
List-Unsubscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post:         <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help:         <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com



NetResult Internal Reference:  EchoStar_NRID13196



Please quote the above EchoStar_NRID13196 reference in all communications
with us regarding this issue.



Dear Sirs,



We write on behalf of EchoStar Satellite L.L.C. ("EchoStar") the exclusive
broadband/Internet rights holder for USA, Mexico, Canada and the Caribbean
for the 2006 India vs. England Cricket Tour (the "Series").



We have noticed that your website, http://fss.portaliraton.net/ and
http://www.sportsheaven.org <http://www.sportsheaven.org/> is displaying
Audio Visual (A/V) content from the above Series.  As you are aware, you've
engaged in such display without obtaining authority or authorization from
EchoStar to do so.



Please be advised that your unauthorized use of EchoStar's intellectual
property constitutes an infringement of EchoStar's exclusive copyrights.
Please immediately cease all such infringing activities on any and all of
your web sites (and elsewhere) and confirm to us via email that you have
done so.



Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute an
express or implied waiver of any of EchoStar's rights or remedies, all of
which are expressly reserved.



Formal Declaration



I hereby state that EchoStar is the sole owner of the rights referenced
above and that NetResult is authorized to act on its behalf with respect to
internet monitoring and compliance.



On behalf of the owner of the exclusive rights with respect to the content
at issue in this notice, I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that
use of such A/V in the manner complained of is not authorized by the owner,
its agent, or the law.



I, Jonny Hartley, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign
this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United
States of America with the additional statement under penalty of perjury
that the information in the notice is accurate.



We thank you for your cooperation.



Yours sincerely,



Jonny Hartley

NetResult

A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd

Mulberry House

583 Fulham Road

London

UK SW6 5UA



Tel: 0207 471 1730





Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail
immediately to the correct person or department for action.



-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFEPSBhvK/XpJs6oyURAoLdAJ0XyjREmAjKGH/B15qPl9NhxHvPXACghHYx
AmDoqDdJOdQooEsOzi/XTJM=
=tLhW
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
